sub_topic: Probability of rolling a certain number on a dice
message_1: What is the probability of rolling a 3 on a fair six-sided dice, if the dice is rolled once?
message_2: The probability of rolling a 3 on a fair six-sided dice is 1/6, as there is 1 favorable outcome (rolling a 3) and 6 possible outcomes (rolling a 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6).
